sponsor.partnerMessage: Calling Arkansas home for almost 115 years, Generations Bank will soon have its first location in Missouri. Generations Bank is a full-service bank ready to serve you through all the stages of your life. Learn more here.

posts.title: Forward Thinking
posts.content:
Fayetteville is on the road to clean energy and is a leader in environmental sustainability.

  • Investing in the environment: Per an approved measure for a climate resilience plan, the City of Fayetteville plans to put $100k annually into a fund for “ecologically sensitive properties” and natural solutions to offset extreme weather. 
  • Direction for the future: The plan is yet to be drafted, but the idea is that it would inform future policies and actions and act as a guide for the preservation of our environment. 

Click HERE to read more about the initiative.

posts.title: The Sky's The Limit
posts.content:
It’s officially happening — drone deliveries across Northwest Arkansas. 

  • Flying packages: Walmart invested in DroneUp in June after realizing it could offer customers delivery within minutes versus hours, and now has successfully started operations at the Neighborhood Market in Farmington. Operations will be live 12hrs a day, 7 days a week at the first NWA locations. 
  • To your door: The next two delivery hubs will be in Rogers and Bentonville and will open in the coming months. Even the most fragile packages can be flown by skilled operators and placed at a customers home in as little as 30 min. 

Learn more about the expansion HERE.

posts.title: Meals Out
posts.content:
This week is traditionally celebrated with a feast on Thursday, though some don’t have the resources or desire for a home cooked Thanksgiving meal.

  • Around the region: We've found a few list of restaurants in the region that are either helping out with cooking or will be open for dine-in Thanksgiving day.
  • Helping hand: Additionally, on the 25th, the Salvation Army will be handing out pre-packaged meals at two locations in Northwest Arkansas and be delivering meals to first responders.

Find out whats available and open HERE.

posts.title: A Standout Crowd
posts.content:
Northwest Arkansas has done it again, slipping its way onto Huffpost’s The Most Underrated Travel Destinations In The US list. 

  • One city: Along with 16 other underrated cities or towns perfect for domestic travel, Bentonville made the cut with its museums, trails, and outdoor scene as the big draw.
  • Our home: Bentonville and NWA is home to a diverse community of people dedicated to making our space one for everyone to connect, explore, exchange ideas, and feel at home while on a continuous adventure. 

See the full list of underrated travel destinations HERE.

posts.title: Bows And Arrows
posts.content:
It's about time to begin thinking about holiday gifts and The Quiver Archery Range has the perfect one! 

  • Give the Gift of Archery: The Quiver Archery Range at Osage Park has membership gift cards available for purchase in person or online.  
  • Open Black Friday: Want to try archery for yourself? Start a new family tradition and opt outside at The Quiver on Black Friday. Open 11a to 5p – that’s plenty of time to drop in for an hour of practice or shoot your first shot! 

For more information, click HERE.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Microphone: Looking for something new with the family over the holiday? Singing at Big Box Karaoke in Fayetteville could be a new holiday tradition!*
  • Going to grandmas: Travel over Thanksgiving is expected to be up 13% from last year.
  • Mind right: The VA will open new mental health clinic in Fayetteville and Fort Smith.
  • Stops for nobody: You Hogs fans still have plenty of action this week - check out the list of sporting events here.
  • Tour guide: Check out our coffee and pizza guides and expose your families to the good NWA tastes.

That will be all from us this week, folks! Have a great holiday, and we'll see you Monday!

*content is sponsored
